events.message: I ordered a jacket last week and it arrived with the wrong size. I want to return it and get a refund as soon as possible.
The reported issue has been classified under refund requests to ensure it is handled by the appropriate team.
Support agent John Doe has been assigned to this case to assist with the refund process.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you'd like a refund for your order with the wrong size jacket.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm the size you received so I can process the refund efficiently?
My order number is 123456789. I ordered a medium but received an extra large instead.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund once you return the jacket using the prepaid shipping label we will send shortly.
Thanks for the quick response and solution. I appreciate the prepaid label, that makes returning easy.
The refund case is now closed pending receipt of the returned item. Please ship it back at your earliest convenience.
Just checking in to confirm you received the shipping label and to see if you need any further assistance with the return.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. Thank you for your patience. This case is now closed.
